functions.tag: {CustomModelData:1,display:{Name:'{"translate":"いいつりざお","color":"#FFFFFF","bold":true,"italic":false}',Lore:['[{"text":"❖ ","color":"aqua","italic":false},{"translate":"%1$s%2$s(IV)","color":"white","with":[{"translate":"練餌の"},{"translate":"刻印"}]}]','{"translate":"%1$s 釣り初心者の手引き %1$s","color":"#00B3FF","with":[{"text":"☆","color":"#FFFF00"}]}','{"translate":"～ワンポイント アドバイス～","color":"#FFFFFF"}','{"translate":"この世界では、%1$s","color":"#9ED8FF","with":[{"translate":"バイオーム毎に","color":"#88FF00","bold":true}]}','{"translate":"異なる「%1$s」が存在します。","color":"#A6C9FF","with":[{"translate":"釣れるモノ","color":"#3F57FF","bold":true}]}','{"translate":"また%1$sと%2$sのバランスも様々です！","color":"#A8BAFF","with":[{"translate":"リターン","color":"#FFEE00","bold":true},{"translate":"リスク","color":"#FF0033","bold":true}]}','{"translate":"どの場所でも%1$sが潜んでいるので、常に%2$sに備えましょう！","color":"#ADADFF","with":[{"translate":"危険","color":"#FF0000","bold":true},{"translate":"戦闘","color":"#FF0000","bold":true}]}']},Engraving:{EnchantID:"練餌",Tier:4},AttributeModifiers:[]}
